justification: Candidate has extensive experience in electrical design and project management, relevant to the role.
Demonstrated leadership in managing cross-functional teams and vendors as required in the job.
Strong record in conducting FAT/SAT confirms expertise in installation and commissioning.
Educational background matches the educational requirements of the job.

requirements.criteria: Proficiency in conducting and managing FAT/SAT
10+ years of experience in project management and electrical design

input.job_description:
## Job Title: Senior Electrical Engineering Project Lead  

**Company Overview:**  
Join XYZ Engineering Inc., a leading firm in electrical project management and automation solutions, recognized for delivering high-impact projects across various international locations. Our focus lies in providing sustainable and innovative solutions by integrating cutting-edge technology and specialized expertise.  

**Role Description:**  
XYZ Engineering Inc. seeks an experienced Senior Electrical Engineering Project Lead to oversee electrical design, installation, commissioning, and testing projects. The candidate will coordinate cross-functional teams to ensure project success while managing stakeholder relations and fostering a collaborative environment.  

**Key Responsibilities:**  
- Lead and execute electrical engineering projects for the installation and commissioning of E-Houses and switchgear systems.  
- Manage multiple vendors and contractors to ensure compliance with project specifications and deadlines.  
- Conduct design reviews, evaluations and prepare documentation for client approvals.  
- Foster team engagement, provide training, and communicate project updates effectively.  
- Ensure projects adhere to safety and quality standards while meeting client expectations.  

**Skills Required:**  
- Strong leadership and project management abilities.  
- Proficiency in electrical design evaluation and project costing.  
- Expertise in Installation, Testing, and Commissioning of Electrical Systems.  
- Capacity for handling contractors and ensuring effective team management.  

**Educational Requirements:**  
Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Electrical Engineering; a Master's degree in Management is a plus.  

Join us and leverage your expertise to drive breakthroughs in engineering solutions across various industries!
minimum_requirements: Proficiency in conducting and managing FAT/SAT
10+ years of experience in project management and electrical design
input.resume:
ABDULLAH JAWAID 
Gulshan e Iqbal, block 2, Karachi, 75300 | +92 334 3664340 | abdullahjawaid@hotmail.com  
Summary Statement 
 Initiative-taking Electrical Engineer with 10+ years of experience excelling in electrical design, project 
management, and Installation, Testing & Commissioning. Proven record in team engagement, 
equipment procurement, and project execution. Effective communicator with expertise in handling 
contractors, vendors, and clients. Proficient in progress reporting and adept at ensuring project success 
through meticulous diligence and efficient procedures. 
Project Based Experience  
 Testing & Pre-Commissioning Lead  | E-House for DS03 Electrical Power Upgrade at CPS4  for 
Rumaila Operating Organization (ROO) – Iraq | May-Jul 2024  
 Achievements:  
 Thoroughly conducted internal testing of ABB ZS1 6.6kV Switchboard (16 panels), including 
motor and transformer feeders, EATON 400V switchboard, Chloride DC UPS 60A, F&G 
system, and auxiliary systems. 
 Successfully led the integrated Factory Acceptance Test (iFAT) with the customer for the entire 
E-house, receiving appreciation for its successful completion. 
 
 Project Lead  | LV Switchboard & Soft Starter Panels for AVINA Clean Hydrogen Inc. – USA | 
Apr-Present 2024  
 Achievements:  
 Leading the sourcing and design validation of ABB ReliaGear Switchboard and standalone 
PSTX series soft starters. 
 Ensuring technical compliance and meeting tight deadlines by offering fast delivery products. 
 
 Commissioning Lead  | E-house Commissioning Services at Basrah Natural Gas Liquefaction Plant 
(BNGL), Basrah Gas Company (BGC) – Iraq | Mar-Apr 2023 & Jan-Apr 2024  
 Achievements:  
 Managed multiple vendors and clients from technical, commercial and administrative aspects to 
execute Site Acceptance Tests, pre-commissioning, and commissioning of 4 E-houses.  
 Provided technical support for first solo/load runs of the medium and low voltage motors and 
troubleshooting throughout the project execution. 
 Enhanced my role by conducting mechanical inspections, interlock checks, and making logic

 Managed multiple vendors and clients from technical, commercial and administrative aspects to 
execute Site Acceptance Tests, pre-commissioning, and commissioning of 3 ABB E-houses.  
 Provided technical support for site modifications as per customer requirements. 
 
 Electrical Lead  | Frontier Works Organization 10,000 cubic meter / day SWRO Plant, Karachi – 
Karachi Nuclear Power Plant |  Apr 2019 – Jan 2023  
 Achievements:  
 Single handedly managed multiple vendors and clients from technical, commercial, and 
administrative aspects throughout the design, procurement, installation, testing and 
commissioning phases of the project. 
 Eyed for details to follow stringent nuclear facility requirements such as sourcing of scarcely 
available Class 1E category power cables. 
 Used my negotiation skills to close out the procurement within budget and ensured deliveries 
ahead of schedule. 
 
 Electrical Engineer  | 8.2 MW 18V32 HFO Engine (used) with Switchgear System Engineering 
Review, Procurement, Installation & Commissioning – National Refinery Limited (NRL), Karachi | 
2017 – 2018.  
 Achievements:  
 Supported team in the design, procurement and installation commissioning.  
 
 Electrical Engineer  | Implementation of Yokogawa DCS in Lube Refinery – NRL | 2017 – 2018 
 Achievements:  
 Successfully devised conceptual circuit for MCC operation from DCS, approved by Yokogawa 
engineering team and implemented. 
 Enhanced site grounding system to follow Yokogawa requirement. 
 
 Project Lead  | Electrical System Upgrade of 4 MW 12V32 HFO Engine (Wartsila) – NRL | 2016 –

 Achievements:

 Electrical Engineer  | Replacement of 7.5 MW Steam Turbine, Control System Upgrade, and

 3  Electrical Engineer  | Revamp of Crude Distillation Unit – NRL | 2015 – 2016  
 Achievements:

 Trainee – Senior Management  | National Refinery Limited  (NRL) | 2014 – 2015  
 Achievements:  
 Demonstrated active involvement in troubleshooting in different process areas including power

 Trainee Engineer  | Installation of Vertical Cement Mills - Lucky Cement Limited  | 2014 
 Achievements:  
 Effectively worked on switchgear protection relay testing and power cables testing.
